::: callout
**Get ready for a day full of inspiring talks, informative discussions, and networking opportunities with transplant professionals.**
:::

Join us on **Fri 6^th^ October 2023** for an exciting day of discussions and presentations from world leading experts in the field of organ donation and transplantation. The Cardiff Transplant Symposium will cover the cutting edge issues and technologies emerging in organ donation and transplantation. Don't miss out on this chance to expand your knowledge.

::: {.callout-important icon="false" appearance="default"}
## CDP Accreditation

**This symposium has been approved by the Federation of Royal Colleges of Physicians UK for 6 external (category 1) CPD credits.**

![](images/Royal_College_of_Physicians_logo.svg.png){fig-align="right" width="120" height="41"}
:::
